soft_skills.title: Communication
soft_skills.description: Ability to clearly convey information and ideas to technical and non-technical stakeholders.

soft_skills.title: Problem-solving
soft_skills.description: Skilled at identifying and analyzing issues to develop creative and effective solutions.

soft_skills.title: Teamwork
soft_skills.description: Experienced in collaborating with cross-functional teams to achieve project goals efficiently.

soft_skills.title: Adaptability
soft_skills.description: Capable of adjusting to new challenges, tools, and technologies in fast-paced environments.

soft_skills.title: Time Management
soft_skills.description: Efficient in prioritizing tasks and managing multiple projects to meet deadlines.

soft_skills.title: Leadership
soft_skills.description: Able to take initiative and lead teams towards achieving common goals, while mentoring junior developers.
